column2: :flashlight: Set a spotlight focus on DOM element adding a overlay layer to the rest of the page

column5:
Merge pull request #24 from ptbrowne/circle-focus

Circle focus
fix(circle): use min from width/height to get the size of the circle
fix(audrey): image was not available anymore
feat(circleFocus): ability to have the focus in the shape of a circle
